beats.backtext: ▓▓▓▓▓ PAGE 7 ▓▓▓▓▓|$hero_name is murmuring nervously|—’Too bright, too open.’

beats.text: ‘Keep your head down, Little man-cub’ |VS| said $hero_name crouching. ‘The Kite Hawks are circling in the $storyTime. I can feel their shadows on my back. I feel... naked out here without a tree to lean on’ |VS| whispered covering his head.
beats.backtext: ▓▓▓▓▓ PAGE 7 ▓▓▓▓▓|$hero_name's tries not|to be too loud..

beats.text: ‘But look at them. People usually don't look up. They have other things to worry for. They walk as if the whole world belongs to them’ |VS| exclaimed $hero_name, starting to walk faster, while you tried to say something.
|VS| Then $hero_name muttered after looking at you, |VS|  ‘You are right. We must not shrink. Chest out. Chin up. Walk heavy, like the Elephant. Make the ground shake so they know we are here.’
beats.backtext: ▓▓▓▓▓ PAGE 7 ▓▓▓▓▓|$hero_name's thumps is|feet agains the ground.

beats.text: |VS| You both started to walk faster. After a while, $hero_name added |VS| ‘We survived the clearing. Good. Now, let's find cover before our luck runs out. Where is the next page?’
beats.backtext: ▓▓▓▓ ✓ PAGE 7  ▓▓▓▓|A new page is|in the backpack.
